comment: Interface to be implemented by listeners for window focus events.

methods.name: public void onWindowFocusChanged(Activity activity, boolean hasFocus)
methods.comment:
* Called when the window focus changes for {@code activity}.
         *
         * @param activity The {@link Activity} that has a window focus changed event.
         * @param hasFocus Whether or not {@code activity} gained or lost focus.

methodNames: public void onWindowFocusChanged(Activity activity, boolean hasFocus)
